socOverviewSankey.LABEL_FILTER_RECORD: Filter Record Which Contains The JSON Data
socOverviewSankey.LABEL_SELECT_A_MODULE: Select a module which contains JSON field
socOverviewSankey.LABEL: Label
socOverviewSankey.TOOLTIP_DATASOURCE: Select 'Record Containing JSON Data' to render data from a single JSON record within the module. Select 'Get Live Data' to enable selection of module and fields, rendering real-time data based on specified filters
socOverviewSankey.TOOLTIP_JSONDATA: It allows you to select a single JSON record within the module.
socOverviewSankey.TOOLTIP_LIVEDATA: It allows you to select a module and fields, rendering real-time data.
socOverviewSankey.TOOLTIP_JSON_SELECT_MODULE: Select the Module which has JSON data
socOverviewSankey.TOOLTIP_JSON_TYPE_DATA: Select the Field which has the data, only json type fields will be available in the dropdown
socOverviewSankey.TOOLTIP_JSON_RECORD_FIELD: This widget requires only one JSON record to work hence It is recommended to apply a filter, in case of multiple records first record will be assumed
socOverviewSankey.MESSAGE_NO_NODES_LINKS: Nodes and Links not created by the given data!
socOverviewSankey.RECORD_SIZE_LABEL: Number of records to be fetched
